t: A Prayer{H8605} of David{H1732}. Bow down{H5186}{H8685)} thine ear{H241}, O LORD{H3068}, hear{H6030}{H8798)} me: for I am poor{H6041} and needy{H34}.
Preserve{H8104}{H8798)} my soul{H5315}; for I am holy{H2623}: O thou my God{H430}, save{H3467}{H8685)} thy servant{H5650} that trusteth{H982}{H8802)} in thee.
Be merciful{H2603}{H8798)} unto me, O Lord{H136}: for I cry{H7121}{H8799)} unto thee daily{H3117}.
Rejoice{H8055}{H8761)} the soul{H5315} of thy servant{H5650}: for unto thee, O Lord{H136}, do I lift up{H5375}{H8799)} my soul{H5315}.
For thou, Lord{H136}, art good{H2896}, and ready to forgive{H5546}; and plenteous{H7227} in mercy{H2617} unto all them that call{H7121}{H8802)} upon thee.
Give ear{H238}{H8685)}, O LORD{H3068}, unto my prayer{H8605}; and attend{H7181}{H8685)} to the voice{H6963} of my supplications{H8469}.
In the day{H3117} of my trouble{H6869} I will call{H7121}{H8799)} upon thee: for thou wilt answer{H6030}{H8799)} me.
Among the gods{H430} there is none like unto thee, O Lord{H136}; neither are there any works like unto thy works{H4639}.
All nations{H1471} whom thou hast made{H6213}{H8804)} shall come{H935}{H8799)} and worship{H7812}{H8691)} before{H6440} thee, O Lord{H136}; and shall glorify{H3513}{H8762)} thy name{H8034}.
For thou art great{H1419}, and doest{H6213}{H8802)} wondrous things{H6381}{H8737)}: thou art God{H430} alone.
Teach{H3384}{H8685)} me thy way{H1870}, O LORD{H3068}; I will walk{H1980}{H8762)} in thy truth{H571}: unite{H3161}{H8761)} my heart{H3824} to fear{H3372}{H8800)} thy name{H8034}.
I will praise{H3034}{H8686)} thee, O Lord{H136} my God{H430}, with all my heart{H3824}: and I will glorify{H3513}{H8762)} thy name{H8034} for evermore{H5769}.
For great{H1419} is thy mercy{H2617} toward me: and thou hast delivered{H5337}{H8689)} my soul{H5315} from the lowest{H8482} hell{H7585}.

O God{H430}, the proud{H2086} are risen{H6965}{H8804)} against me, and the assemblies{H5712} of violent{H6184} men have sought{H1245}{H8765)} after my soul{H5315}; and have not set{H7760}{H8804)} thee before them.
But thou, O Lord{H136}, art a God{H410} full of compassion{H7349}, and gracious{H2587}, longsuffering{H750}{H639}, and plenteous{H7227} in mercy{H2617} and truth{H571}.
O turn{H6437}{H8798)} unto me, and have mercy{H2603}{H8798)} upon me; give{H5414}{H8798)} thy strength{H5797} unto thy servant{H5650}, and save{H3467}{H8685)} the son{H1121} of thine handmaid{H519}.

Shew{H6213}{H8798)} me a token{H226} for good{H2896}; that they which hate{H8130}{H8802)} me may see{H7200}{H8799)} it, and be ashamed{H954}{H8799)}: because thou, LORD{H3068}, hast holpen{H5826}{H8804)} me, and comforted{H5162}{H8765)} me.
